column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I ordered the totchos and they didn't even tell me the tator tots were not available
column2: instead they substituted fries and brought it out. When asked
column3: they said they didn't have any tator tots and that we are lucky because we got their secret menu. This is after I had already placed an order of Bosscat fries. My entire dish was basically all potatoes.
